mapper.insert: insert into company ( buildingname, sido, sigungu, bname,bcode,lat,lng,userid) values ( #{buildingName}, #{sido},#{sigunGu}, #{bName},#{bCode},#{lat},#{lng},#{userid})
mapper.select: select companyno, buildingname, sido, sigungu, bname,lat,lng,userid from company where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update company set buildingname = #{buildingName}, sido = #{sido}, sigungu = #{sigunGu}, bname = #{bName},bcode=#{bCode}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng} where companyno = #{companyno}
